sources.full: Trip trough the cosmos - Monk Subclasses

subclass.name: Way of the Ancient Roots
subclassFeatures: Way of the Ancient Roots|Monk||Ancient Roots|Cos|3

subclassFeature.name: Way of the Ancient Roots
entries: Monks who follow the way of the Ancient Roots understand that Ki is not an exclusive thing to monks, every living organism has Ki flowing trough them, from a small flower to an gigant owlbear. All monks can stop the flow of Ki in other creatures, such as with the Stunning Strike technic, but only the Ancient Roots allows the monk to use its Ki to interact with anothers creatures flow.

subclassFeature.name: Spellcasting
entries: Sometimes a punch can cast magic, who saw that coming?

subclassFeature.name: Spellcasting ability
entries: Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for your monk spells. You use your Wisdom whenever a spell refers to your spellcasting ability. In addition, you use your Wisdom modifier when setting the saving throw DC for a monk spell you cast and when making an attack roll with one. In addition, you use your Wisdom modifier when setting the saving throw DC for a monk spell you cast and when making an attack roll with one.

subclassFeature.name: Spellcasting focus
entries: You may use plants or fungi as your focus for spells, we call this a {@i plant focus} to simplify. A {@i plant focus} works simiraly to a magical focus with a catch. As you touch a plant you may choose to cast a spell right from where your hand is touching the plant or from another part of the plant/fungi, a distant branch, exposed roots, unblosomed flowers, etc...
Using this feature you may extend the range of your cantrips and Flow Technics trough the body of the {@i plant focus}, up to a 150ft maximum.
A plant focus may be: seeds, spores, mushrooms, small plants, bushes, trees, etc...

subclassFeature.name: Magic Stick & Cantrips
entries: At 3rd level you gain knowledge of the {@spell monk's shillelagh|Cos} cantrip and two more cantrips from the {@filter druid spell list|spells|class=druid}.
You may change your cantrips every time you level up on this class.

subclassFeature.name: Flow Technics
entries: Your understanding of Ki flow has reached a point that allows you to make more than grow small flowers. You learn Flow Technics which allow you to mold plants in ways you would have never imagined.
Flow Technics are a mix of spellcasting and battle maneuvers, this mix allows for a tactital deployment of magical plants against enemies.

Flow Technics require a Plant Focus to cast. Technics share some rules with spells, for example some require concentration and all are affected by spells such as dispel magic and counterpell dispelling any plant creation. When in doubt use the spellcasting rules.

items: 'Casting' trough magical plants may present the player with unforeseen magical effects.
Giving your player magical plants instead of weapons may be an interesting idea to explore.
A player may try to 'make' it's weapon, i do recommend you and the player read a bit about 'Plant grafting'.

Open battles with grass on the ground present this subclass with an unparalleled range at such low levels (210ft. if you use Caltrops's Spines), this may become a headache or a way for players to express their creativity.

subclassFeature.name: Technic Stacking
entries: Some technics can be stacked which means that can be casted mutiple times in the same action.
Example: You may want to hit a creature 60Ft. from you using a 30ft. range technic (Extending Vines). You will be able to hit it if you stack the technic: Using 2 Ki but only 1 bonus action.
Technics that can be stacked will have the 'Stackable' property and can be done so up to a maximum equal to your wisdom modifier per action.

subclassFeature.name: Flow Begginer
entries: You learn {@optfeature rooting web|Cos} and {@optfeature extending vines|Cos} from the {@filter flow technics|optionalfeatures|feature type=ft|source=Cos} list.

subclassFeature.name: Fury of Sticks
entries: You may now use a weapon created wih Monk's Shillelagh instead of unarmed strikes when you hit with Fury of Blows and if you used a flow technic as your action you may use fury of blows as your bonus action

subclassFeature.name: Aprentice of Flow
entries: You learn {@optfeature wolf dust mushroom|Cos}, {@optfeature beetlebomber's fire flowers|Cos}, {@optfeature fruity explotion|Cos} and {@optfeature caltrops's spines|Cos} from the Flow {@filter flow technics|optionalfeatures|feature type=ft|source=Cos} list.

subclassFeature.name: Green Foot
entries: You gain the ability to move freely along plant surfaces. You may end your turn on a vertical or paralel surface to the ground (Heads down) position, you will not fall as plants grab your body and keep it in place.

subclassFeature.name: Master of Flow
entries: You learn {@optfeature cultivate|Cos}, {@optfeature leaf baloon|Cos}, {@optfeature green fist|Cos} and {@optfeature wall of plants|Cos} from the {@filter flow technics|optionalfeatures|feature type=ft|source=Cos} list.

subclassFeature.name: Flow Expert
entries: You learn {@optfeature ancient tools|Cos} and {@optfeature last meal|Cos} from the Flow {@filter flow technics|optionalfeatures|feature type=ft|source=Cos} list.

spell.name: Monk's Shillelagh

components.m: A piece of a living plant, mushroom, fresh seed or 1/16 pounds of spores

entries: The piece of plant/fungi you are holding grows in interaction with your Ki into a quarterstaff. You may use Wisdom instead of Strength or Dexterity for the attack and damage rolls of melee attacks of this weapon.
The weapon's damage die it's a d6.
The staff is considered alive and the spell ends if it dies, the spell also ends if you cast it again.
Your magical staff damage increases when you reach 5th level (1d8), 11th level (1d10), and 17th level (1d12).

optionalfeature.name: Rooting Web

item: A seed or 1/16 pound of spores dust

entries: {@i Ki cost: 1}
{@i Casting time: 1 Action}
{@i Range: 30Ft.}
{@i Components: M (A seed or 1/16 pounds of spores, which is consumed)}
{@i Duration: Concentration, 1 minute}

You throw a seed to a point 30ft. from you. Grasping weeds, roots and vines sprout from the ground in a 10-foot radius starting from the seed. For the duration, these plants turn the ground in the area into difficult terrain for creatures other than you.

A creature in the area (Except you) when you cast the technic must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be restrained by the entangling plants until the technic ends. A creature restrained by the plants can use its action to make a Strength check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself.
If you loose concentration or the technic ends all creatures are set free, but the plants live for a day before drying up and dying.

optionalfeature.name: Extending Vines
entries: {@i Ki cost: 1}
{@i Casting time: Free or bonus action}
{@i Range: 30Ft.}
{@i Duration: Instant}
{@b Stackable}
Vines extend from your {@i plant focus} and transmit your Ki flow.
You may extend the Range of any technic for 30Ft. Using this technic in such a way makes the casting time a free action.

You may also use this technic as a ranged spell attack, 30Ft. on a hit deal your {@b martial arts dice} plus wisdom modifier as magical piercing damage. This cost 1 Bonus Action. Can also be used to pull/push/hold on to things or make an improvised rope.
Vines can pass trough a hole an inch in diameter and can root themselves to the ground and walls.

optionalfeature.name: Beetlebomber's Fire Flowers
entries: {@i Ki cost: 2}
{@i Casting time: 1 action}
{@i Range: 10Ft cone, self}
{@i Duration: Instant}

You grow 2 flowers in your hand, as they touch each other they react. A hot spray of chemicals covers a 10ft. cone, a creature inside the cone's area must succed a dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC or takes your Martial Arts Dice plus wisdom magic fire damage. If a creature succeds it takes half the damage rounded down.
The damage increases at level 11 to 2 times your Martial Arts Dice plus wisdom modifier.
The damage increases at level 17 to 3 times your Martial Arts Dice plus wisdom modifier.

optionalfeature.name: Caltrops's Spines
entries: {@i Ki cost: 1}
{@i Casting time: 1 attack action}
{@i Range: 60ft/120ft}
{@i Duration: Instant}

You grow a pod of caltrop's fruits, as you touch it the pod opens and a fruit covered in spines flies away. Make a ranged spell attack, the damage is your Martial Arts Dice plus your wisdom modifier magical piercing damage.

optionalfeature.name: Wolf Dust Mushroom
entries: {@i Ki cost: 2}
{@i Casting time: 1 action}
{@i Range: 30ft}
{@i Components: M (1/16 pounds of spores dust, which is consumed)}
{@i Duration: 1 Minute}

You throw a handfull of spores into a point 30ft. from you, a dark grey puffball mushroom with a spherical tip grows from the bag. It explodes making a dense cloud 10Ft. in radius of dark spores, which is iritating to the eyes. Creatures in this area can't see, except by wearing some eye protection.
The spores are extremly flamable any contact with fire will light them up, and any creature in the area takes your Martial Arts Dice as magic fire damage. This also removes the spore cloud.

optionalfeature.name: Fruity Explotion
entries: {@i Ki cost: 2}
{@i Casting time: 1 action}
{@i Range: 30ft}
{@i Components: M (A seed, which is consumed)}
{@i Duration: Instant}

You throw a seed to a point 30ft. from you. A giant palm fruit grows from the seed, and as it grows the explotion is inminent. Every creature in a 20ft radius of the point must make a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC, on a fail it becomes covered in fruit juice.

A creature covered in the juices may use its action to clean it in any way it has. If the creature doesn't clean the juices it must succed a dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC every time it decides to start to move or be nocked prone and loose half it's movement.
The juice is flamable, a creature set a flame recieves your Martial Arts Dice as magic fire damage at the start of every turn for a minute or till extinguished.
The fire damage it's not stackable if you splash a creature with more juice or oil.

optionalfeature.name: Cultivate
entries: {@i Ki cost: 1}
{@i Casting time: 1 action}
{@i Range: Touch}
{@i Duration: Instant}
You may choose one of the following effects:

items: Grow a seed or a bush into a bush or size large tree.
Provided of a cultivable ground, grow a patch of grass from a seed. The patch grows 40ft. in radius centered on the seed.
Create 2 'Fruits of Hunger' from a bush or 5 from a tree. A 'Fruit of Hunger' provides enough food an water for a day and lasts for a week without going rotten.
Create a 'Fruit of Fertility' from a bush or tree which contains 50 seeds that last fresh for a month.

From 1 ration of food, which is consumed, create a 'Fungus of Propagation', you may take a pound of spores from it. You may take 1 pound of spores each day by feeding it 1 ration of food each day. Spores last fresh for a month.
Touching a living tree create a simple object or objects made out of wood, that must fit in a 3ft cube. If the object is complex in nature you may require proficiency in Artisan's Tools to make it.

optionalfeature.name: Green Fist
entries: {@i Ki cost: 3}
{@i Casting time: 1 bonus action}
{@i Range: 5ft.}
{@i Duration: 1 minute }
You summon a {@creature green fist|Cos} made of veiny wood, roots and leaves in an area within 5ft. of you. You may immediately use the {@i Green Fist's Nature's Force} attack and move it up to 30ft.
You may move the fist & make another attack using your bonus action, to do so spend 1 Ki point.
After the duration the fist dries up and dies. You may only have one {@creature green fist|Cos} at a time, the technic ends if you cast it again.

optionalfeature.name: Leaf Baloon
entries: {@i Ki cost: 1}
{@i Casting time: 1 action}
{@i Range: 5ft.}
{@i Duration: Instant}
You create a sphere of silky white leaves, it rapidly bulks up as it becomes filled with air, slowly it floats upwards.
A maximum of 2 medium creatures or 1 large creature can hold to it and float upwards at a velocity of 15ft. per round. Having multiple Leaf Baloons stacks the floating velocity.
For each size beyond large you may add an extra baloon to float at 15ft.

optionalfeature.name: Wall of Plants
entries: {@i Ki cost: 2}
{@i Casting time: 1 action}
{@i Range: 5ft.}
{@i Duration: Instant}
{@b Stackable}

A wall of living mush and branches erupts from a space 5ft. from you. You may create a 20ft. x 10ft. x 5ft. wall of plants or you may choose to instead create an object with eight connected 5 foot cubes or a 10 foot diameter sphere.
If you are planning to trap a creature inside a sphere, it must make a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC, on a fail it becomes trapped.
The wall has an AC of 15 and 12 hit points, it's vulnerable to fire.

optionalfeature.name: Ancient Tools

item: A weapon created by monk's shillelagh

entries: {@i Ki cost: 2}
{@i Casting time: 1 action}
{@i Range: 5ft.}
{@i Duration: Instant}
Touching a weapon that has been created by Monk's Shillelagh you enhance its power for the duration, growing a blade made from white wood out of your staff, transforming it into a living scythe.

For the duration your weapon and technics now deal an extra 1d6 magic damage of the technic/weapon damage, and you may use Extending Vines, Caltrops's Spines and Wall of Plants for free for the duration.

optionalfeature.name: Last Meal
entries: {@i Ki cost: 2}
{@i Casting time: 1 action}
{@i Range: 5ft.}
{@i Components: M (1 pound of spores dust, which is consumed)}
{@i Duration: Instant}

You throw a bag of spores to a creature 30ft. from you, the creature must succed a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or become the food of a giant mushroom. If the creature fails it becomes stunned till the beginning of your next turn and receives 6d10 magic acid damage. If it succeds it only takes 3d10 magic acid damage.

monster.name: Green Fist
senses: Has no senses, shares your knowledge of creature location

trait.name: Ancient Link
entries: The Green Fist's Strenght score becomes your Wisdom score and the Dexterity score is your Dexterity score. It also shares your Proficiency Bonus.

trait.name: Massive
entries: The Green Fist may provide half cover.

monster.actionNote: Requires Your Bonus Action and 1 Ki point

action.name: Nature's Force
entries: {@atk mw} Finesse (Str or Dex plus PB), reach 5 ft., one target you can see.
Your {@b martial arts dice} x 3 + your wisdom modifier magic bludgeoning damage.
The damage of this ability increases by one {@b martial arts dice} if the Green Fist was casted from a tree and it increases again by one **martial arts dice** if you reach level 17.
